alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 12:31PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN COCKE AND CENTRAL SEVIER COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 131 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pigeon Forge, or 8 miles northwest of Gatlinburg, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Wears Valley, Cosby, Harrisburg, and Hartford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cocke Smoky Mountains; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains
